verses.name: Acts 25:16
verses.text: To whom I answered, It is not the manner of the Romans to deliver any man to die, before that he which is accused have the accusers face to face, and have licence to answer for himself concerning the crime laid against him.

verses.name: Acts 25:17
verses.text: Therefore, when they were come hither, without any delay on the morrow I sat on the judgment seat, and commanded the man to be brought forth.

verses.name: Acts 25:18
verses.text: Against whom when the accusers stood up, they brought none accusation of such things as I supposed:
